Developed an Asset Management System for DICT - Luzon Cluster 1 for my capstone(IT Project) as a Full-stack web developer and the Lead Programmer of the team. Web development background and technologies used are HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel 7, Bootstrap, and MySQL.
